themes.name: Greek Myth Gold
themes.creator: Camden
themes.description: A golden Greek‑myth inspired CUT theme with parchment textures, Cinzel fonts, gold accents, and custom notification video.

1.0.notes: Initial release with wallpapers, icons, sounds, and notification video.

1.1.notes: Improved icon pack and added lockscreen wallpaper.

2.0.notes: CUT 2.0 upgrade: added window manager styles, terminal theme, and app overrides.

themes.name: Camcookie Blue
themes.creator: Camcookie INC
themes.description: The official Camcookie OS theme with blue accents, soft glow UI, and smooth notification animations.

themes.name: Dark Neon
themes.creator: Community
themes.description: A high‑contrast neon theme with glowing borders, animated notification video, and neon‑blue terminal.

1.2.notes: Added animated notification video and improved accent colors.
